pullrequest.title: Logging Part 2: Inserting messages into a log file

content.raw:
Time would be pretty easy to replace with `std::chrono::nanoseconds`. I think the way the tests are using `Filesystem` could be replaced using the technique in the second section on [this page of the sqlite3 docs](https://www.sqlite.org/inmemorydb.html).

`Console` verbosity was very helpful while writing command line part. It would be  a shame to lose it, but we could make do with `std::cout` and `std::cerr`.
